title: Incompetency of recipient
context: §346-38 Incompetency of recipient. If the recipient is found incapable of taking care of the recipient&rsquo;s money or oneself, the department of human services may direct its assistance to be paid to a legal guardian or any other reputable person for the recipient&rsquo;s benefit or may suspend assistance for such period as it deems fit. [L 1941, c 296, pt of §1; RL 1945, §4844; RL 1955, §108-24; HRS §346-38; am L 1970, c 105, §5; gen ch 1985; am L 1987, c 339, §4]
